版本选择: http://blog.csdn.net/anningzhu/article/details/60468723
http://hbase.apache.org/book.html#zookeeper.requirements
选择：zookeeper-3.4.9.tar.gz

/home/xxproject/lib
tar -xzvf zookeeper-3.4.9.tar.gz
ln -sf zookeeper-3.4.9 zookeeper
mkdir -p /home/xxproject/data/zookeeper
zoo.cfg 配置拷贝到 /home/xxproject/lib/zookeeper-3.4.9/conf 下面

echo '
# !!!No Modification, This Section is Auto Generated by ZooKeeper
export ZK_HOME=/home/xxproject/lib/zookeeper
export PATH=${PATH}:${ZK_HOME}/bin
' >> ~/.bash_profile
source ~/.bash_profile

三台机器分别执行
echo 1 > /home/xxproject/data/zookeeper/myid
echo 2 > /home/xxproject/data/zookeeper/myid
echo 3 > /home/xxproject/data/zookeeper/myid

# 启动ZK
#./zookeeper/bin/zkServer.sh start
#./zookeeper/bin/zkServer.sh status
# bin/zkCli.sh -server 127.0.0.1:2181
zkServer.sh start
zkServer.sh status
